name: simple-youtube
description: Simple YouTube is a lightweight extension that simplifies your YouTube experience by removing unnecessary clutter.

scripts.build: rm -rf build/ dist/ && mkdir build/ && npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.build:chrome: BROWSER=chrome vite build && cd dist/ && zip -r ../build/chrome-extension.zip * && cp manifest.json ../build/chrome-manifest.json && cd ..
scripts.build:firefox: BROWSER=firefox vite build && cd dist/ && zip -r ../build/firefox-extension.zip * && cp manifest.json ../build/firefox-manifest.json && cd ..
